","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"8da4c92b-9d18-4274-a154-35f03208b02e"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"d79d2d77-54b8-41b9-a55e-c8256cde527c","markdownStyle":"79d43f5c-50c4-4096-8f5b-207e44560e00","markdownStyleParsed":"b81369e7-2d63-4fa6-9eba-c606c169fbb9","markdownCodeLanguage":"e81d1165-7458-47c1-989f-8a65d28271e1","id":"318056d5-1847-4aef-9576-e425e76cff61"}}]},{"identifier":"659be6d6-0268-4d73-89ff-5819e333f623","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"afa3a767-0dc7-411c-b7ae-815b66cfde3d","properties":{"headingText":"Tracking content usage","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"323f226d-235b-4d09-b161-9b5f9abba860"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"22a76ef3-67ef-41ac-aeed-6eb5334c5855","headingLevel":"6f142dd6-c65a-457a-923f-74a78bfb35a6","headingLevelsParsed":"f21d8def-4d7f-4aa2-8b04-3c24882d327a","headingAlignment":"774c2acd-cf76-4fba-9e0d-371ed877cb28","headingAlignmentsParsed":"7d824a47-ecbb-4acc-9af4-35c98369840d","showHeadingAnchor":"42c17078-f7b8-48b9-9f8b-9a8204529779","id":"33a07503-7373-4389-b245-ee539205068d"}}]},{"identifier":"415c535d-7da5-4436-91a1-c9c4a82be823","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"73b9cdfe-304a-400e-b7c3-8f1e4a92c564","properties":{"markdown":"As marketers author more and more reusable content the Content hub, their investment is rewarded by all the features the Content hub offers - powerful filtering, Content hub folders, and smart folders. As content libraries grow they become a large graph of relationships between content items and this is the power of content reuse.

All the features mentioned above help marketers organize and find content, but we want to help marketers see these relationships and understand *where* and *how* their reusable content is delivered across multiple channels. Xperience's new [content usage tracking](https://docs.kentico.com/business-users/content-hub#track-usage-of-content-items) fills this role.

How does usage tracking work? Let's look at the **El Salvador Finca San Jose** coffee reusable content item as an example.

First, we start at the Content hub. It's be updated to show if a content item is linked by any other content items (reusable or in a channel).

Next, we'll review the "In channels" list.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"fcc4defd-cca0-4268-8df4-98f5a9f6a67f"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"2693c1e4-b3f4-4c27-a2a0-882f827786f9","markdownStyle":"5cc32f7d-5f04-438e-ba43-60e0d415589d","markdownStyleParsed":"1dce9046-7b42-48da-b7d8-edd0c2ee53c2","markdownCodeLanguage":"e0c9628c-86b2-4b46-8dc7-305455b32084","id":"1a9524c6-3312-4648-80f5-98ca4bf420b8"}}]},{"identifier":"b88753b2-9af9-4b68-bb97-32826c190a7c","type":"CommunityPortal.ImageWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"c2744647-2f99-4dad-aefb-28675fc0e0dd","properties":{"selectedImages":[{"identifier":"a14f36a0-0d0d-4504-9e67-3e81733748fe"}],"alignment":"Left","alignmentParsed":0,"size":"Full_Width","sizeParsed":3,"showDescriptionAsCaption":false,"linkToFullsizeImage":true,"id":"a9a613a5-8e33-4905-bbf8-d249609fc30b"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedImages":"45444ccb-204b-4c82-884c-e98b0d62f82d","showDescriptionAsCaption":"3ce889f9-f109-4552-b1af-a4f06f8907c8","linkToFullsizeImage":"4ae80ca9-72b9-4150-9b88-fdf9305dc7bc","id":"1f28cf3b-f6e1-46ff-a495-e978b6ff9dd7","alignment":"6bd82541-9a8d-485b-89ae-d849e75ae11b","alignmentParsed":"5e8d7954-553d-48fc-b751-10669b342865","size":"c12f8b24-403d-47b5-a7e6-28e412fde413","sizeParsed":"a481bfe6-d15c-43b4-ab71-b4d21adba502"}}]},{"identifier":"ad924ace-6ef8-42cd-9e4d-1c729dfb164a","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"75c66cba-3057-435f-b4dc-7ff4fe6c0fbb","properties":{"markdown":"In the image above, the list shows all the channel content items that reference the **El Salvador Finca San Jose** coffee - either directly or indirectly.

* **Coffee samples** - a page in the Dancing Goat Pages channel linking to the coffee in the Page Builder, not a Content form field
* **Dancing Goat Regular** - an email in the Dancing Goat Emails channel linking to the coffee in the Featured Coffee field
* **El Salvador Finca San Jose** - a page in the Dancing Goat Pages channel linking to the coffee in the Related Item field
* **Home** - a page in the Dancing Goat Pages channel linking to the coffee *indirectly* in the Cafes field through another reusable content item named **Boston coffee place**. This is the *same* **Boston coffee place** item we saw in the "In reusable content" usage list.

Clicking on the preview or edit action for any of these list items will take us to the page or email in the channel. Clicking on the **Boston coffee place** link will take us to that reusable content item.

As mentioned above, not only does the usages feature track when reusable content items are referenced in content type structured fields, it also shows when an item is referenced in the Page Builder.

Some team members might be responsible for specific areas of a website, others might "sign off" on content changes but not make any changes themselves. An intern could be responsible for PR but definitely *not* the primary website home page.

We've introduced [website channel page permissions](https://docs.kentico.com/x/permissions_pagelevel_xp) so that marketers can assign roles to users and web page editing permissions to those roles.

The entire permission system is based on the hierarchy of web pages in a channel using an inheritance model. By default, web pages inherit the permission assigned to their parent in the page tree going all the way up to the root but we can break inheritance for any page and its descendants to customize their permissions.

It simplifies the setup and management of commerce operations, providing immediate value with minimal configuration requirements. This enables businesses to establish an online store and start selling quickly, making it an ideal solution for those looking for a setup that delivers ROI, fast.

We provide both [Quick start](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-shopify#quick-start) and [full usage documentation](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-shopify/blob/main/docs/Usage-Guide.md).
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"5785e268-d115-4e1f-a58c-b6c441d3c1c7"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"749ab6fd-6a5b-4bc6-83e3-348ad744d3bb","markdownStyle":"76d40566-a79b-45e3-b742-e30c0fcce712","markdownStyleParsed":"991c3c71-2422-4f8d-b0a6-4530fd6c0b30","markdownCodeLanguage":"e949fba5-d491-46a2-a3e3-b4b974494b3d","id":"a4dc4f61-5c7a-45cf-a178-e836c836a8c3"}}]},{"identifier":"9837750f-6a54-4a43-a321-dbe48ffd85b8","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"1f66faa3-1536-46d6-885f-f24011f78cca","properties":{"headingText":"Kentico Xperience 13 bridge","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"f1e2c9d2-14f1-49c5-9ca7-70227726df82"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"a07bb83a-8077-40f6-bee0-066fb2d65816","headingLevel":"9435970c-1e17-43ca-9395-239ce66b778d","headingLevelsParsed":"d9246264-f763-409e-8524-0f9f77997132","headingAlignment":"94bbc380-f976-4f60-bc42-26ea94edea31","headingAlignmentsParsed":"46cb6c46-97b6-4c39-9374-72484a1dccfd","showHeadingAnchor":"2e833f82-fcb2-413b-9cd0-b14a61a5a352","id":"fd94d609-7e7b-4d45-b0db-12727a6bd6f5"}}]},{"identifier":"3021ca78-1c9d-4850-851c-7828856742fb","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e8eb7a0b-8523-4c51-a7fb-0df0650b925f","properties":{"markdown":"We've also developed [a bridge integration](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-k13ecommerce) between Kentico Xperience 13's commerce features and Xperience by Kentico's content management and delivery. It's versatile and particularly beneficial for customers upgrading from previous versions of Kentico. It opens the path to migrate and leverage the proven commerce engine of KX13 along with all the multichannel experience capabilities of Xperience by Kentico. This approach is perfect for projects with high customization requirements, ensuring flexibility and scalability.

Of course, we provide both a [Quick start](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-k13ecommerce#quick-start) and [full usage documentation](https://github.com/Kentico/xperience-by-kentico-k13ecommerce/blob/main/docs/Usage-Guide.md) for this integration as well.

If you are interested in the licensing to support this dual product solution, please contact your Kentico sales representative.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"0851a908-fc66-4a1b-a791-9b2d82a0f526"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"5464072f-2804-4f52-8674-47126c461f4d","markdownStyle":"96c20fb8-b800-48ca-bcf4-4a9091342335","markdownStyleParsed":"c3f35e99-b50f-438f-be87-76be3698edea","markdownCodeLanguage":"2a6df468-c75e-49f0-be45-3dcd5853bf9d","id":"90d15b5b-3993-4246-9654-f0a26ebb9f74"}}]},{"identifier":"024a37de-e08d-43f3-ac4d-52c95ca92816","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"7b008430-a1ac-4e12-83ee-eaee2d0767c5","properties":{"headingText":"New license keys","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"80a110be-b863-4556-97db-33b4e44eb078"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"462c1e13-ee70-4bab-a94e-90f7ca047042","headingLevel":"e4e847d9-a975-417d-be10-3c4b7951ca28","headingLevelsParsed":"c3708d70-e318-4124-945b-877785d307ec","headingAlignment":"29e25f1b-3f64-43ae-972c-804b9efa52fb","headingAlignmentsParsed":"029bddf8-ff6d-4177-87dd-e4a2ac5b1cbb","showHeadingAnchor":"fdc8c157-0fc0-4413-9e82-754d4ddee943","id":"1d624dc5-6c92-4409-8aa1-4e66714e7e1a"}}]},{"identifier":"8fa2cc01-7579-45ee-a57f-ab986aa5f119","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"29789cdf-e6f0-44b9-b5d4-cdde1a2d53b5","properties":{"markdown":"Xperience licenses are no longer based on websites and their domains, but instead are based on channels (both standard and micro). This licensing approach is very different to the site domain licensing of previous Kentico products.

In the past, customers using an entry license tier sometimes didn't realize there was a full suite of amazing digital marketing features in Kentico's products, like powerful no-code marketing automation.

To better support partners and customers and align with the modern multichannel architecture and licensing strategy of Xperience by Kentico, we are adding support for [a new kind of license key](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/installation/licenses) to Xperience solutions.

Xperience by Kentico solutions will now [securely communicate with our license server](https://docs.kentico.com/changelog#product-instance-licensing-changes), bringing several benefits to partners and customers.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"b7e240c9-d592-4340-9ab7-a55cff1e2dd9"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"4c87a50b-f7d5-43c8-a997-dc9f69c6b5cf","markdownStyle":"b76f0d54-192d-4f61-8296-8a8054bab45d","markdownStyleParsed":"7c3bdacb-ee49-4381-b6e5-108c2d6f2b6a","markdownCodeLanguage":"2eec7789-a396-425f-a064-3bc215d10f8c","id":"30342f07-f31c-4194-9df6-b9e5da7db888"}}]},{"identifier":"eaf0cc28-2c36-4e3a-a03d-6361d88f2afb","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"19b84cea-27a6-4e36-927b-ff85088d6f13","properties":{"headingText":"What's different","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"0606658a-1cdd-4737-ae39-731832139964"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"189f31bc-7806-4e48-b566-cc092fd90e02","headingLevel":"5ee725c1-4867-4347-a9bb-4cbe92b86a30","headingLevelsParsed":"27e6c4be-85b4-4c8c-88ce-801ae6cc2b52","headingAlignment":"4ee6b5a2-8801-4802-be3b-d02ca3c90eca","headingAlignmentsParsed":"ff095c6c-e558-4e89-8e16-184188993891","showHeadingAnchor":"467c1d45-38e8-4dfd-960d-882c4db6d436","id":"93adc69b-4910-4190-a954-a555f4ff40e0"}}]},{"identifier":"83e9403e-431d-4180-83de-104ed2236805","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"6a5f6aa3-096c-4895-9056-1ca0d2ace25d","properties":{"markdown":"So, what will users notice with the new license keys functionality?

Customers will...

* No longer need serial numbers for licenses
* Only need 1 production license key per Xperience by Kentico subscription (it can be shared across any number of running instances)
* Never require approval for new keys when creating new channels in production environments
* Never need to update their license key once it is added to their solution (even when changing domains or adding new channels)
* See the limits of their license in the Xperience UI, but be able to “try before they buy”, in a limited sense

The license keys...

* Come in 4 types - production, non-production, trial, and custom
* Are auto-renewing (except for trial license keys and custom keys)
* Track the usage of features and channels in the product to make sure they are within the limits of what is allowed by the license
* Have a new format and are managed in Settings instead of the License keys application

With this July's Refresh, customer and partners can...

* View usage information for all production and non-production license keys for a given license in the Client Portal
* Remotely disable license keys from the Client Portal

This will help partners and customers more easily discover, try, and adopt powerful features in Xperience by Kentico and better manage license keys, by managing them less!
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"b2903619-40b2-4ef8-8e60-21101b65d986"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"93739c55-0268-42fd-be03-915f5f6a388e","markdownStyle":"87579d19-0252-48fb-98fc-2dc513b53a28","markdownStyleParsed":"7f5c4b10-a50a-47cc-a71f-e1a31a22d458","markdownCodeLanguage":"46d05b16-3b32-4b88-aeb0-5b9e690a1e8e","id":"19e0a38a-177e-405d-91cb-463ad8e06918"}}]},{"identifier":"4dd267a0-0ba9-4527-9da5-f8345aae7397","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"04135cec-1489-43ac-9a8d-b6a4fdea4c04","properties":{"headingText":"License key transition","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"ffd1f24c-23a9-4ddb-b199-17e9af8dd570"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"bf0b798d-3d7f-470f-b036-4627c6a6edf2","headingLevel":"72b4ca98-6959-45d7-aa83-31dd5e75dcda","headingLevelsParsed":"d6697fa6-bab3-4a02-a5dd-281d84d72986","headingAlignment":"830bf590-5f6f-4418-ab5c-76d0daac8f02","headingAlignmentsParsed":"3d09d428-b17f-49d4-a427-7c82ecffc9ed","showHeadingAnchor":"b7a074fc-c7e2-4a34-91fa-990099760565","id":"cf951621-1a8c-45b7-aa9e-f3d4a0b127e0"}}]},{"identifier":"4a6f71fe-5cf2-434f-88ae-42e1ac5d520e","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2e9fa072-2f69-4870-a36d-9134f4b9ceef","properties":{"markdown":"While we are enabling this new license key functionality today, the transition period from old to new license keys will occur over several months, so don't panic! You can apply the [July Refresh](https://docs.kentico.com/changelog#refresh-july-25-2024) to your Xperience by Kentico solution now but you don't need to switch to new license keys right away.

We will gradually role out more license key features in Xperience and new license key management features in the [Client Portal](https://client.kentico.com/). Our transition period will end with the October Refresh which will require new license keys. You can read more about this transition process in [our Changelog for this month's Refresh](https://docs.kentico.com/changelog#product-instance-licensing-changes) documentation and in [our license documentation](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/installation/licenses#license-keys-in-version-29.3.0-and-newer) for Xperience by Kentico.

We've designed this transition to be painless and [we're here to help answer any questions](mailto:sales@kentico.com).
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"f1b953eb-5854-46c2-95f9-831bd6ef56d3"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"738d58a9-c147-4176-860e-2f395b8dca17","markdownStyle":"8adf6fdc-bd3f-42bb-a1ea-87e830af2e7c","markdownStyleParsed":"56fa136d-78a8-4324-aade-82ea6c7fad9e","markdownCodeLanguage":"a3bedd47-33f1-45b7-b5c1-fdc40519916c","id":"2b96db40-f4a1-4bcd-b403-89714a7519be"}}]},{"identifier":"d3486f8c-4bf9-4c5f-ae50-e25c9e911f4e","type":"CommunityPortal.HeadingWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"0f2d8fed-328e-4cc8-b915-e400eac4b2a5","properties":{"headingText":"License key user experience","headingLevel":"H3","headingLevelsParsed":2,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"32d877d7-d5b1-423b-8558-164593b75dd5"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"a0c71d7c-d42b-430f-8ccf-bd98a85eb2ba","headingLevel":"9d43a80b-487d-4636-8a77-93df104d93f2","headingLevelsParsed":"d25d37d6-8e44-4c67-8b94-b109189f7c53","headingAlignment":"5f7249ea-7be0-4ba5-81a5-cbc9cb6b6270","headingAlignmentsParsed":"535df0b7-9084-4e21-aa8c-6268b327796b","showHeadingAnchor":"079018b6-76c9-4ee2-8095-0a27add58219","id":"38d613ca-75fa-43f8-8bd4-fdb99b03eead"}}]},{"identifier":"282be58b-84fe-4711-834d-347813179454","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"40876630-e297-4e41-9243-e15d6fc3c0da","properties":{"markdown":"What will these license key changes look like for marketers? This license key won't need to be updated manually because it auto-renews and it won't need to be changed when licensing terms change because it auto-communicates with the license server to get the new limits for channels and features. [Set it and forget it](https://youtu.be/inbysO0iXXg?t=34)!

If you want to know how many channels are included in your license, just navigate over to the Channel management application to see the Channel usage notification.

However, even though Kentico will be notified of the overage, we just want to use it as an opportunity to see if we can help align your license to your goals for your Xperience by Kentico solution - your websites, emails, and headless channels will continue to work.

We hope these new capabilities, features, and API improvements unlock solutions for you. Try them out, [let us know](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes) 👋 what you think.

For [the next Refresh](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes), you can expect a really exciting feature for marketers - [marketing automation for form submissions](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/169-create-automated-email-series-to-follow-up-on-form-submissions). We'll also be adding the other half of our amazing marketer controlled [smart folder technology](https://docs.kentico.com/business-users/content-hub#smart-folders) - [smart folders for content delivery](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/222-smartfolders-for-dynamic-content-delivery). Finally, we'll add full 7-day bugfix support for the [Sitefinity Migration Tool](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/218-sitefinity-migration-tool) - another tool in our constantly growing [Xperience by Kentico Migration Toolkit](https://community.kentico.com/blog/announcing-the-updated-xperience-by-kentico-migration-toolkit). These updates will, as always, accompany a number of UX and developer-focused improvements.
